titleStmt.title: Gregorii Opuscula, or, Notes & observations upon some passages of Scripture with other learned tracts / written by John Gregory ...
Works. 1650
titleStmt.author: Gregory, John, 1607-1646.
Gurgany, John, 1606 or 7-1675.

notesStmt.note: Vol. [1] has added t.p.: Notes and observations upon some passages of Scripture. The second edition.

Vol. [2] has t.p.: Gregorii posthuma, or, Certain learned tracts / written by John Gregorie ... ; together with a short account of the autor's [sic] life and elegies on his much lamented death / published by his dearest friend J.G., B.D. of Merton College. -- London : Printed by William Du-gard for Laurence Sadler ... 1650.
Tracts in v. [2] have separate t.p.'s dated 1649.
T.p. on p. [45]: A discours declaring what time the Nicene Creed began to bee sung in the church ...
T.p. on p. [55]: A sermon upon the resurrection from the I Corinth. XV.XX ...
T.p. on p. [75]: Kainan deuteros, or, A disproof of him, in the 3. of S. Luke. V. 36.
T.p. on p. [93]: Episcopus puerorum, in die innocentium, or, A discoverie of an antient custom in the Church of Sarum, making an anniversarie bishop among the Choristers ...
T.p. on p. [125]: De æris & epochis : shewing the several accounts of time among all nations, from the creation to the present age ...
T.p. on p. [175]: The Assyrian monarchie : being a short description of it's [sic] rise an fall ...
T.p. on p. [255]: The description and use of the terrestrial globe.
Reproduction of original in British Museum.
